name: openagents-web
description: OpenAgents Web - WGPUI + Axum on Cloudflare Workers

scripts.build:worker: cd worker && cargo install -q worker-build && CC_wasm32_unknown_unknown=/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin/clang AR_wasm32_unknown_unknown=/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ar worker-build --release
scripts.build:wallet-worker: cd wallet-worker && cargo install -q worker-build && CC_wasm32_unknown_unknown=/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin/clang AR_wasm32_unknown_unknown=/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ar worker-build --release
scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:client:opt && bun run build:dist
scripts.dev:worker: bun run build && npx wrangler dev --local
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bun run build:worker && npx wrangler deploy --env ""
scripts.deploy:preview: bun run build && bun run build:worker && npx wrangler deploy --env preview
scripts.deploy:wallet: bun run build:wallet-worker && npx wrangler deploy --config wrangler-wallet.toml
scripts.dev:wallet: bun run build:wallet-worker && npx wrangler dev --config wrangler-wallet.toml --local
scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply openagents --local
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply openagents
scripts.setup: bun run db:create && bun run kv:create && echo 'Update wrangler.toml with the IDs above, then run: bun run db:migrate'
